If you want to receive email notifications when we update our IP addresses, please log in to FastCron, visit Account > Profile, check the box "Receive email notifications about FastCron IP change".

You can fetch our IP list at https://www.fastcron.com/ip.txt (all IP), https://www.fastcron.com/ipv4.txt (IPv4 only), https://www.fastcron.com/ipv6.txt (IPv6 only).
